name: Camping de Haro
title: (26200) Camping de Haro
description: Great campsite! Kid friendly, lots of local families come here for their vacation. Staff super friendly (1-2 people speak english but the others really try to understand what you are saying) Restaurant is pretty simple but good (closed on Tuesdays). Amenities are very clean, take care for (3euros for laundry). The plots are great and well lit. Recommend to take at least a standard for a RV. The best part is that you are 10min walk to Haro (wine country town with tons of winery)Would totally stay here again!

This car park is much quieter than the next one, located a few hundred meters away, at the foot of the dam in the turning area. Optimal satellite reception but 4G very perfectible.

title: (26339) Ábalos - 2 Diseminado Abalos
description: Spent a quiet night here after the wine festival on 9/3/2022. About 500m from the center and 200m from Bodegas Abeica.

title: (26213) Leiva - 10 Calle las Eras
description: Area with tables and grass, municipal pools and bar

title: (26330) Briones - LR-314
description: Beautiful shaded picnic area to come and eat lunch or spend some time. it must be possible to sleep but the parking lot is not that great. non-drinkable water. bbqs available.

title: (01426) Villanañe - A-3320
description: Beautiful place to stop to rest or spend a night. It is between a local road where there are practically no cars and a river with crystal clear waters. There is a rope to jump into the water! The space to stop is not very big but a motorhome can fit without problems and there are several tables around it. Full nature...

title: (01307) Samaniego -
description: Grills and tables at the place where hiking trails start.

title: (09217) Imiruri - 7 Calle Manzano Verde
description: Parking at the doors of the town of Imiruri, nice and quiet, no signs forbidding to stay the night. Great spot for a walk/hike to the ghost town of Ochate and its tower.

title: (01195) Vitoria-Gasteiz - Paduleta Kalea
description: Normal side parking spaces in the industrial area. Opposite is a hotel and restaurant, therefore lively and lit by street lamps. Cars drive by all the time, so not quiet, but safe.

title: (09280) Miraveche - Camino de Gadillanos
description:
Sheltered place with views to equal parts and very quiet. It is a car park with exit routes, but in a less frequented area. 2 or 3 flat seats. No services. Collect the
  toilet paper if you don't have a chemical toilet.
Good place to sleep near the Miraveche-Silanes via ferrata.

title: (01426) Caranca -
description: Near a river, very quiet, shady place... perfect for spending the night.

title: (26340) La Rioja - 38 Diseminado S Asensio
description: A scape from noise, spent evening there and visited Castle, nice views and chill out With silence, pity not too much shadow, maybe autumn better to visit.

title: (01307) Samaniego - A-2124
description: Mirador de la Rioja, ample parking, with tables and great views, easy access.

title: (09280) Cubo de Bureba - 52 Calle San Millan
title_short: (09280) Cubo de Bureba - 52 Calle San Millan
description:
Next to the national one. Small town crossroads with pharmacy. Bar in the town square with pinchos and portions. Supermarket in the morning every day next to the parking lot. Small and quiet parking with tables. Sports field and swings.

In the town you can find the well of the batteries. In a park dedicated to Félix Rodríguez de la Fuente.

The Genaro fountain at the north entrance of the town.

A hundred-year-old almond tree one kilometer from the town to the south.

And of course the Obarenes Mountains about 5 km away. From here it is easy to reach Pico la Maya, Galdampio, la Verdina, Castrocuño, Cantoña, Ventanas, all of them between 1,200 and 1,400 meters.

Places of interest in the area:

7km via ferrata from Silanes
8km from Pancorbo
14km from Briviesca
17km from Tobera waterfalls
20km cold
25km from Miranda de Ebro
25km from the salt pool
28km Oña
30km from Haro
at 30km Sobron
35km from the Añana Salt Flats
56km from Burgos
56km from Vitoria-Gasteiz
60km from the Nervion waterfall

There are several mountain bike routes to the Obarenes mountains.

title: (01307) Samaniego -
description: Small field between farms to eat or spend the night, room for about 3 vans. It has good access and the land is flat. It has no services, since it is a mountain.

title: (01439) Sendadiano - 12 Sendadiano Entitatea
description: Picnic area with 4 tables, a fountain and swings. It's near the church, very quiet area. Difficult for vehicles over 5 m in length.

title: (01426) Uribarri Gaubea - 94 Arquitecto Jesus Guinea Kalea
title_short: (01426) Uribarri Gaubea - 94 Arquitecto Jesus Guinea Kalea
description: Large land in front of the town school, without services and 5 minutes from the town. Excellent for overnight.

title: (01439) Arriano - 10 Arriano Entitatea
description: It is a town where if you go to Salto de Nervión you can leave the car here and go the next day, it is very cute.

title: (26257) Bañares - 1 Camino Salceda
description: Parking with swings, picnic tables, grass. There is a spring of water but you cannot approach the caravan. Quiet site next to the municipal swimming pools.

title: (01191) Mendoza - 32 Mendoza Entitatea
description: Going up towards the church, there is a playground for children. in front of the church you will find a tap!

title: (26340) San Asensio - Autopista Vasco-Aragonesa
description: Possible to fill fresh water. Be aware the flow rate is low (takes a long time to fill a big tank)

title: () Uribarri Gaubea - 1Y Nueva Villa Urbanizazioa
description: Motorhome area in progress, it currently has a large area for parking and swimming pools nearby

title: (01307) Samaniego -
description: About 200m along the path, which begins in a curve below the viewpoint, is a quiet little square, secluded from the road. Sensational visibility and the road is not audible. Space for 2 vans and quite flat. Attention: in the middle there is a metal tube concreted in at foot height!

title: (01191) Mendoza - 38 Mendoza Entitatea
description: At the foot of the castle of Mendoza and close to the river to wash or cool off. Ideal for a picnic break.

name: Ibaia kanpina
title: (01195) Ibaia kanpina
description: Scruffy area and the place doesn't look any better either. I think people live here forever.- We actually wanted to go to the pitch, but since there was no sun, we needed electricity.

title: (01194) Lasarte - 20 Lasarte Entitatea
description: Quiet parking to spend the night.

title: (01195) Zuhatzu Gasteiz -
description: Shaded parking in the afternoon, access for PL and Bus (our measure 12m) very quiet place with two picnic tables in the shade lots of pedestrians but people are very respectful. Access to the city of Vitoria in 10min max. About 10 car parking spaces. 1 bin which is emptied regularly. Ideal place to rest and spend the night in peace

title: (01007) Vitoria-Gasteiz - Peregrino Ibilbidea
description: Superb location in a new street without any construction, at the foot of a large park and the start of several superb walks. (Compostela) very calm. Almost no traffic, no service.

title: (01439) Luna -
description: Hikers' parking lot right in the mountains. Please do not leave toilet paper! Trash cans are available. Slightly sloping ground.

title: (01195) Krispiña - 4 Crispijana Entitatea
description: Parking in the green ring to walk around and enjoy the surroundings

title: (26250) Santo Domingo de la Calzada - Camino Banos
title_short: (26250) Santo Domingo de la Calzada - Camino Banos
description: Parking outside in newly built area. Quiet and a walk from the town.

title: (09244) Fuentebureba - 9 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Great parking space in the center of the village surrounded by nature. Quiet and idyllic.

title: (01015) Gasteiz - 42-50 Sofia Erreginaren Hiribidea
description: Long road that runs through an area of public parks with a large supermarket nearby. In the area there are also great areas to walk and some bars less than a five minute walk away.

title: (01191) Vitoria-Gasteiz - Avenida los Huetos
description: No service but quiet in the middle of the fields! We only have to eat but we must be able to spend a peaceful night!

title: (09280) Cascajares de Bureba -
description: Lonely place in the middle of the orchards. Right on a widening of the road, practically flat. Good views, 100m from the road. There is no shade. The sun shines from sunrise to sunset.

name: Toboganes camping
title: (26257) Toboganes camping
description: Camping Bañares, with autocarabana area with light. The campsite has a swimming pool, multi-sport area, paddle, playground and aquapark

title: (01427) San Zadornil - 1 A-4338
description: San Zadornil, next to the park house.

title: (01015) Gasteiz - 2 Juan Gris Kalea
description:
Municipal swimming pools, showers and public toilets.
In summer they usually close for rest a few days call before going

title: (26257) Hervías - Camino de Valpierre
description: Parking and picnic area at Laguna de Hervias. A place that must be protected and cared for because it is a Singular Natural Area, protected as an oasis in the middle of an agricultural area, of great interest to aquatic birds. Here begins a path that surrounds the lagoon for a walk. Access by road in good condition (has some shallow pothole)

title: (01007) Vitoria-Gasteiz - A-3102
description: Mendizábala parking, very large with green areas around

title: (09244) Fuentebureba - 43A Calle Poza
description: Quiet estate with trees to spend the night

title: (01010) Gasteiz - 32 Ali Entitatea
description: West of Victoria, good for an overnight stopover. quiet, public lighting. Places along the road with very little traffic. 40 minutes walk from the old town center.

title: (01007) Gasteiz - 2 Amadeo Garcia de Salazar Plaza
title_short: (01007) Gasteiz - 2 Amadeo Garcia de Salazar Plaza
description: Showers at the Municipal Sports Center. Large changing room and lots of showers, bathroom, hair dryer... Very clean.

title: (09212) Pajares -
description: Car park of the Peña del Mazo necropolis. without services. fairly level, fits 3-4 vans. close to the starting point of the Desfiladero del Purón route. heart attack sunset

title: (01007) Vitoria-Gasteiz - 2 Amadeo Garcia de Salazar Plaza
title_short: (01007) Vitoria-Gasteiz - 2 Amadeo Garcia de Salazar Plaza
description: Great Parking Mendizorrotza Stadium, very quiet at night, near the center (10 min) walk and next bus. Avoid the days of events. Municipal pools next

title: (09270) Cerezo de Río Tirón - 5 Calle Campo de Futbol
title_short: (09270) Cerezo de Río Tirón - 5 Calle Campo de Futbol
description: In front of the municipal swimming pools and next to the sports center, recreational area with grills, tables, soccer field and the town 5 minutes away.

title: () Santo Domingo de la Calzada - Calle Peseta
title_short: () Santo Domingo de la Calzada - Calle Peseta
description: Parkings much quieter than those proposed at the foot of the ramparts. Huge of unused car parks. Very beautiful city viszoneiter.

title: (26250) Santo Domingo de la Calzada - 121 Calle del Doce de Mayo
title_short: (26250) Santo Domingo de la Calzada - 121 Calle del Doce de Mayo
description: Free parking, with shade to spend the night. quiet area and no noise at night. Very frequented by AC and campers. Nearby there is a bar with a small shop where you can buy bread, newspapers and cold drinks. With a park next door and 5 minutes from the historic center of the city.

title: (26250) Santo Domingo de la Calzada - 7 Plaza de la Alameda
title_short: (26250) Santo Domingo de la Calzada - 7 Plaza de la Alameda
description: Automatic laundry and dryer. In the morning it is freer. in the afternoon very busy with pilgrims.

title: (26250) Santo Domingo de la Calzada - 7 Poligono Sup Sector 11
title_short: (26250) Santo Domingo de la Calzada - 7 Poligono Sup Sector 11
description: Little busy street near the village in front of a small park with swings.

title: (01006) Vitoria-Gasteiz - 34F Campo de los Palacios Kalea
title_short: (01006) Vitoria-Gasteiz - 34F Campo de los Palacios Kalea
description: A dozen places, right next to an entrance to Olarizu Park. Quiet, we stayed there for a few hours during the day.

title: (01300) Guardia - Unnamed Road
description: Berberana picnic area, with barbecue, tables and children's area. Parking is small

title: (01008) Gasteiz - 1 Miren Martinez Saez del Burgo Kalea
title_short: (01008) Gasteiz - 1 Miren Martinez Saez del Burgo Kalea
description: Quiet street on the outskirts of the new neighborhoods of Gasteiz.

address.street: 1 Miren Martinez Saez del Burgo Kalea

title: () Santo Domingo de la Calzada - 2F Avenida Nájera
title_short: () Santo Domingo de la Calzada - 2F Avenida Nájera
description: Nájera Avenue is located very close to the center. On the sides there is enough space to park motorhomes. There is a lot of space and it is ideal to visit the city.

title: (09212) Barcina del Barco - BU-530
description: Easily accessible area just off a not very busy road. In the middle of nature with shade, tables and a small raft. Somewhat uneven terrain and mosquitoes.

title: (01191) Gasteiz - 17 Gobeo Entitatea
description: Parking avec toilettes public et jeux pour enfants

title: (01008) Vitoria-Gasteiz - 25 Calle Pintor Teodoro Dublang
description: Free parking 10 minutes from the city center on foot by tree lined paths. advised directly by the tourist office. shot of the historical center in the nueva cathedral on the way

title: (26250) Santo Domingo de la Calzada - 90 Camino de Lechares
title_short: (26250) Santo Domingo de la Calzada - 90 Camino de Lechares
description: It is the parking of the ambulatory, 3 min walk from the center and shops nearby. There are no services

title: (01191) Gasteiz - 23 Gobeo Entitatea
description: Parking at the entrance of Gobeo. Little frequented road at night. Entrance to the green belt of Vitoria-Gasteiz. Nice place to spend a night. Gas station in front and fountain in the town 2 minutes walk.

title: (01010) Vitoria-Gasteiz - 23 Urartea Kalea
description:
Ideal for cleaning motorhomes. It gives height and can be refueled.

LPG Cannister fill up okay as of February 2023.

title: () Santo Domingo de la Calzada - Camino del Alto de Corporales
title_short: () Santo Domingo de la Calzada - Camino del Alto de Corporales
description: Discovered this place by chance in the morning. Can very well be suitable for a night in the middle of nature. Very nice view of Santo Domingo, La Rioja and surrounding mountains from the observatory. At sunset it must be fabulous. Place is not maintained and seems abandoned.

title: (01006) Araba - s/n Olarizu Hiribidea
description: Very quiet place throughout the year in the green ring of Vitoria-Gasteiz at the foot of the emblematic hill of Olarizu and next to the house of the dehesa (center for environmental studies) where in its exhibition space we will find the WC. Being in a park we find fountains and areas with tables, benches, swings, ... Just 300m from a supermarket and the popular neighborhood of Olarizu.

title: (01006) Gasteiz - 4 Zumakadi Ibilbidea
description:
It is a paid parking area but in August it is free. we came here because the big motorhomes can't fit in the nearby area.
I guess you can sleep in this area but I'm not sure

title: (01006) Vitoria-Gasteiz - 1 Iruraiz-Gauna Kalea
description: Parking burger king et carrefour last empty places! Right next to a park with fountain, ping pong table, children's park, quiet area !!

title: (01006) Vitoria-Gasteiz -
description: Free and quiet day parking, near the old town of Vitoria Gasteiz, bars on the same street and the classroom (library).

title: (01006) Gasteiz - 12 Campo de los Palacios Kalea
title_short: (01006) Gasteiz - 12 Campo de los Palacios Kalea
description: Ample parking next to a Lidl 20'walk to the center

title: (01194) Mendiola - 7 La Salceda Kalea
description: Parking in town. You have a little field next door and the night's rest is assured.

title: (09211) Oña - 6 BU-504
description: Sendero del Portiilo on the road to Frias

name: Camping Puerta de Los Montes Obarenes
title: (09244) Camping Puerta de Los Montes Obarenes
title_short: (09244) Camping Puerta de Los Montes Obarenes
description: Camping Puerta de Los Montes Obarenes. Very small campsite near the pool and the football field in Busto de Bureba. Simple restaurant and bar, plenty of shade and free access to the city pools. Open in summer!

title: (26259) Grañón - 1 Camino de la Ermita
description: Parking without any service. Very quiet for walking or cycling, the village is 1.5 km away where you can find everything.

title: (01010) Gasteiz - 8 Coronela Ibaibarriaga Kalea
description: Quiet place to spend the night next to the hospital. There are several bars around to have breakfast. at night there was no noise at all.

title: (01427) Villafría de San Zadornil - Camino de Herrán
title_short: (01427) Villafría de San Zadornil - Camino de Herrán
description: Parking in the village, no noise, where the road ends, fountain, tables, barbecue. Fairly narrow road.

title: (01010) Gasteiz - 43 Pamplona-Iruñea Kalea
description: self-service laundry

title: (01006) Gasteiz - 45 Anboto Kalea
description: Parking at the foot of the Olarizu Park

title: (01309) Guardia - Vitoria Errepidea
description: Small parking lot next to a modest historic site, great views of the Rioja mountains and vineyards

title: (09511) Berberana - 1 Barrio Uraye
description: Perfect place day and night, very quiet, with the backdrop of the bells bells. Fairly narrow passage, more for a van.

title: (01196) Vitoria-Gasteiz - 222 Autovía del Norte
description: Repsol LPG service station.

title: (01118) Lagran - 1 San Bartolome Kalea
description: Area with tables and barbecue before reaching the camping area

title: (01118) Lagran - 1 San Bartolome Kalea
description: Quiet area with beautiful views. With the possibility of hiking trails.

title: (01010) Gasteiz - 31 Landaberde Kalea
description:
Municipal swimming pools shower.
Call ahead just in case I don't know if it closes some days in summer.

title: (01010) Vitoria-Gasteiz - 50 Donostia San Sebastian Kalea
description: Self service laundry including detergent and softener in price. Cash only for dryer. Cash and credit card for washing machines. There is a change machine in the shop.
